alert.note: Alert for Adams; Dauphin; Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 3:42PM EDT until September 07 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Adams County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 342 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lower Allen to New Oxford to near Manchester, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... York, Hershey, Weigelstown, Elizabethtown, Columbia, Middletown, Mount Joy, Red Lion, Spry, Dallastown, Shiloh and East York. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 254 to 258. Interstate 83 from mile markers 0 to 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
